testcase.name: testConfigFileExists
testcase.system-out: Config file exists : Yes Config file is available : Yes it is available

testcase.name: testCreatePdf
testcase.system-out: object(Omaralalwi\Gpdf\GpdfConfig)#366 (1) { ["config":protected]=> array(40) { ["tempDir"]=> NULL ["fontDir"]=> bool(false) ["fontCache"]=> bool(false) ["defaultFont"]=> string(11) "dejavu sans" ["fontHeightRatio"]=> float(1.1) ["isFontSubsettingEnabled"]=> bool(true) ["chroot"]=> NULL ["storage_path"]=> string(23) "/public/downloads/pdfs/" ["aws_storage_bucket"]=> string(0) "" ["aws_storage_region"]=> string(0) "" ["aws_storage_key"]=> string(0) "" ["aws_storage_secret"]=> string(0) "" ["convert_entities"]=> bool(true) ["allowedProtocols"]=> array(2) { [0]=> string(4) "http" [1]=> string(5) "https" } ["artifactPathValidation"]=> bool(true) ["logOutputFile"]=> NULL ["defaultMediaType"]=> string(15) "application/pdf" ["defaultPaperSize"]=> string(2) "A4" ["defaultPaperOrientation"]=> string(8) "portrait" ["dpi"]=> int(150) ["enable_php"]=> bool(false) ["isPhpEnabled"]=> bool(false) ["isRemoteEnabled"]=> bool(true) ["allowedRemoteHosts"]=> array(1) { [0]=> string(11) "example.com" } ["isJavascriptEnabled"]=> bool(true) ["isHtml5ParserEnabled"]=> bool(false) ["debugPng"]=> bool(false) ["debugKeepTemp"]=> bool(false) ["debugCss"]=> bool(false) ["debugLayout"]=> bool(false) ["debugLayoutLines"]=> bool(false) ["debugLayoutBlocks"]=> bool(false) ["debugLayoutInline"]=> bool(false) ["debugLayoutPaddingBox"]=> bool(false) ["pdfBackend"]=> string(4) "DPDF" ["pdflibLicense"]=> string(0) "" ["httpContext"]=> NULL ["utf8GlyphsMaxChars"]=> int(150) ["utf8GlyphsHindo"]=> bool(false) ["utf8GlyphsForceRtl"]=> bool(false) } }
